attributes.action: ensure that any politician who demands or has demanded that benefit 'cheats' (or similar terminology) should be pursued or sanctioned, has not made unwise, questionable, or mistaken claims for Parlimentary allowances or other benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Prime Minister to review the voting record of MPs to ensure that current MPs have not made negative statements about the claims of those seeking benefits or called for enhanced rigour concerning pursuance of wrongful benefit claimants, while seeking Parliamentary allowances that they may not be entitled to, have made questionable claims for, or have made mistaken claims for Parliamentary allowances due to the complexity of the system. I call for this monitoring as an individual who is in full-time work and is a non-claimer of benefits, but is concerned by the potential for charges of MP hypocrisy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
